metadata.title: CVE-2024-31755 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
cJSON v1.7.17 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation, which cantrigger through the second parameter of function cJSON_SetValuestring atcJSON.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-31755` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcjson1 - 1.7.17-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cjson package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.17-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
